name: GetSheetDocumentation
description: Returns the available documentation at the provided position (column/line number) in the sheet.

properties.name: Column
properties.description: The 1-based column number of the position in the sheet that you would like documentation for.

properties.name: Line
properties.description: The 1-based line number of the position in the sheet that you would like documentation for.

properties.name: Sheet
properties.description: The sheet that you would like to have documentation for

properties.name: Documentation
properties.description: The documentation for the requested position. Will be null if there is no available documentation.
